All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationService
Service class handling internship application operations for students.
ApprovalProcessor
Processes approval and withdrawal operations for companies and students.
ApprovalService
Service class handling approval operations for company representatives and internships.
CareerCenterStaff
Represents career center staff member with approval and viewing capabilities.
CompanyRepresentative
Represents a company representative who can create and manage internship opportunities.
ConsoleUI
Console-based implementation of the UserInterface for command-line interaction.
DataLoader<T>
Interface defining a contract for loading data from CSV files.
FilterManagementService
Service class managing internship filtering operations for students.
FilterManager
Manages filtering operations for internship opportunities.
InternshipApplication
Represents an application by a student for an internship opportunity.
InternshipFilter
Represents filter criteria for searching and sorting internship opportunities.
InternshipFilterService
Service interface for filtering internship opportunities and retrieving available filter options.
InternshipFilterServiceImpl
Implementation of InternshipFilterService providing filtering and data extraction for internships.
InternshipOpportunity
Represents an internship opportunity with details, applications, and status management.
InternshipService
Service class providing internship retrieval and filtering operations.
InternshipViewer
Interface for displaying internship opportunities with filtering capabilities.
InternshipViewerService
Service class providing customized internship viewing for different user types.
Main
Main application class for the Internship Placement Management System.
SessionManager
Manages user sessions with timeout functionality and automatic cleanup.
StaffDataLoader
Data loader implementation for CareerCenterStaff objects from CSV files.
Student
Represents a student user who can apply for internships and manage applications.
StudentActions
Defines actions that students can perform related to internships.
StudentDataLoader
Data loader implementation for Student objects from CSV files.
User
Abstract base class representing a user in the internship management system.
UserInterface
Defines a contract for user interaction components in the internship management system.
UserSession
Represents a user session with activity tracking and filter management.
